definitions.definition: One engaged in politics, especially an elected or appointed government official.
definitions.example: Politicians should serve the country's interest.

definitions.definition: Specifically, one who regards elected political office as a career.
definitions.example: Unlike the other candidates, I'm not a politician.

definitions.definition: A politically active or interested person.
definitions.example: Only real politicians are interested in this issue.
There is a politician in every office.
